title: The Padron Family and News On Cuba
itunes:title: The Padron Family and News On Cuba
description:
An interview with Jorge Padron became a family affair as patriarch Jose Orlando Padron joins us with Jorge Padron's brother Orlando. We discuss 50 years of Padron Cigars and what the new Cuban relationship with the USA means for them and the tobacco industry. 
We also discuss what the New Course of Cuba means and weigh in on when we think the embargo will be official. Join us as we get Debonaire with Chuck Morrison, Step into the Aging Room with Old Fart Freddy and Bad News Barry with new trademarks and news!
